Sentencas: Oxides with practical applications, such as high T-c superconductors, catalysts, solid oxide fuel cells and membranes frequently contain basic cations, which under synthesis or process conditions will be subjected to CO2-containing atmospheres and a carbonatization degradation may be initiated.
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: In this paper the conditions for synthesis (formation) of potential Ln(2)O(2)CO(3) degradation products are described for the rare earth oxides Ln(2)O(3), Ln=La, Nd.
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: Emphasis is put on describing conditions for the formation of well characterised phase-pure samples of La2O2CO3 (type IA/II), Nd2O2CO3 (type IA/II) and of the solid solution series La2-xNdxO2CO3 (type II), 0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 2, by means of decomposition studies on rare earth acetates and citrates and by carbonatization studies on the corresponding rare earth oxides.
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: For the calculation of phase stability relationships, thermodynamic data for Ln(2)O(2)CO(3) are required.
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: Herein, the thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3 II has been studied by means of thermogravimetry and isothermal annealing experiments in atmospheres with various partial pressures of CO2 (30.4 to 1.01 x 10(5) Pa).
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: The experimental results were used to establish the equilibrium pressures of CO2 for the decomposition reaction Nd2O2CO3 II (s) --> A-Nd2O3 (s) +
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: CO2 (g) in the temperature region 800-1100 K. The median standard molar enthalpy and entropy of the decomposition reaction are 213+/-27 kJ mol(-1) and 195+/-26 J K-1 mol(-1), respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II

Sentencas: At 298 K Delta(d)H(m)degrees=221+/-27 kJ mol(-1) and Delta(d)S(m)degrees=206+/-26 J K-1 mol(-1).
Titulo: Synthesis of rare earth oxide carbonates and thermal stability of Nd2O2CO3II
